mapper.select: select emp.empid, emp.empname, org.oid, org.oname, role.rid, role.rcode, role.rname from wx_dish_role role left join wx_dish_org_role_ref orgrole on orgrole.rid = role.rid left join wx_dish_organization org on org.oid = orgrole.oid left join wx_dish_org_emp_ref orgemp on orgemp.oid = org.oid left join wx_dish_employee emp on emp.empid = orgemp.empid where role.deleted = 0 and orgrole.deleted = 0 and org.deleted = 0 and orgemp.deleted = 0 and emp.deleted = 0 and emp.`status` <> -1 and org.bid = #{weid} and role.rcode = #{role_code}
